org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.client

Class RoomsRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.RestClient<RoomsApi>
      • org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.client.RoomsRestClient

  • public class RoomsRestClient
extends RestClient<RoomsApi>
    Class used to make requests to the rooms API.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String transactionId,
                        java.lang.String roomId,
                        Message message,
                        ApiCallback<Event> callback)
        Send a message to room
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the unique transaction id (it should avoid duplicated messages)
        roomId - the room id
        message - the message
        callback - the callback containing the created event if successful

      • sendEventToRoom

        public void sendEventToRoom(java.lang.String transactionId,
                            java.lang.String roomId,
                            java.lang.String eventType,
                            com.google.gson.JsonObject content,
                            ApiCallback<Event> callback)
        Send an event to a room.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the unique transaction id (it should avoid duplicated messages)
        roomId - the room id
        eventType - the type of event
        content - the event content
        callback - the callback containing the created event if successful

      • getRoomMessagesFrom

        public void getRoomMessagesFrom(java.lang.String roomId,
                                java.lang.String fromToken,
                                EventTimeline.Direction direction,
                                int limit,
                                ApiCallback<TokensChunkResponse<Event>> callback)
        Get a limited amount of messages, for the given room starting from the given token. The amount of message is set to DEFAULT_MESSAGES_PAGINATION_LIMIT.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room id
        fromToken - the token identifying the message to start from
        direction - the direction
        limit - the maximum number of messages to retrieve.
        callback - the callback called with the response. Messages will be returned in reverse order.

      • reportEvent

        public void reportEvent(java.lang.String roomId,
                        java.lang.String eventId,
                        int score,
                        java.lang.String reason,
                        ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Report an event.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room id
        eventId - the event id
        score - the metric to let the user rate the severity of the abuse. It ranges from -100 most offensive to 0 inoffensive
        reason - the reason
        callback - the callback containing the created event if successful

                   java.lang.String tag,

        Parameters:

        tag - the new tag to add to the room.
        order - the order.
        callback - the operation callback

      • updateJoinRules

        public void updateJoinRules(java.lang.String aRoomId,
                            java.lang.String aJoinRule,
                            ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Update the join rule of the room. To make the room private, the aJoinRule must be set to RoomState.JOIN_RULE_INVITE.
        Parameters:
        aRoomId - the room id
        aJoinRule - the join rule: RoomState.JOIN_RULE_PUBLIC or RoomState.JOIN_RULE_INVITE
        callback - the async callback response

      • updateGuestAccess

        public void updateGuestAccess(java.lang.String aRoomId,
                              java.lang.String aGuestAccessRule,
                              ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Update the guest access rule of the room. To deny guest access to the room, aGuestAccessRule must be set to RoomState.GUEST_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN
        Parameters:
        aRoomId - the room id
        aGuestAccessRule - the guest access rule: RoomState.GUEST_ACCESS_CAN_JOIN or RoomState.GUEST_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN
        callback - the async callback response
